mapper.insert: insert into tb_log (log_msg, log_dt, device_uid) values (#{log_msg},#{log_dt},#{device_uid})
mapper.select:
SELECT log_seq, log_msg, log_dt, device_uid, sbs_alias FROM ( SELECT rownum rn, ls.log_seq, ls.log_msg, ls.log_dt, ls.device_uid, ls.sbs_alias FROM ( SELECT l.log_seq, l.log_msg, l.log_dt, l.device_uid, s.sbs_alias FROM tb_log l, tb_subscription s, tb_device d WHERE l.device_uid = d.device_uid AND d.device_seq = s.device_seq AND d.device_seq = TO_NUMBER(#{type}) ) ls WHERE
rownum <= #{pageNum} * #{amount} ) WHERE rn > (#{pageNum} - 1) * #{amount}

SELECT log_seq, log_msg, log_dt, device_uid, sbs_alias FROM ( SELECT /*+ INDEX_DESC(tb_log IDX_tb_log_PK) */ rownum rn, l.log_seq, l.log_msg, l.log_dt, l.device_uid, s.sbs_alias FROM tb_log l INNER JOIN tb_device d ON l.device_uid = d.device_uid LEFT OUTER JOIN tb_subscription s ON d.device_seq = s.device_seq WHERE
rownum <= #{pageNum} * #{amount} ) WHERE rn > (#{pageNum} - 1) * #{amount}

SELECT COUNT(*) FROM tb_log WHERE
log_seq > 0

SELECT COUNT(l.log_seq) FROM tb_log l, tb_device d WHERE
l.device_uid = d.device_uid AND d.device_seq = TO_NUMBER(#{type})
